author: tknight-dev
description: A multithreaded rendering engine with physics
name: dirt

scripts.dirt-engine-archiver-dev-shared: nodemon --quiet --watch src/dirt-engine/assets/shared/**/* -e mp3 -x "node src/dirt-engine/scripts/archiver.js dist shared"
scripts.dirt-engine-archiver-dev-ui: nodemon --quiet --watch src/dirt-engine/assets/ui/**/* -e mp3 -x "node src/dirt-engine/scripts/archiver.js dist ui"
scripts.dirt-engine-archiver-dev-video: nodemon --quiet --watch src/dirt-engine/video/**/* -e mp3 -x "node src/dirt-engine/scripts/archiver.js dist video"
scripts.dirt-engine-prod: rimraf dist-dirt-engine && tsc --project tsconfig.dirt-engine.json && node src/dirt-engine/scripts/archiver.js dist-dirt-engine && npm run dirt-engine-sass
scripts.dev: rimraf dist && npm run tsc && node src/dirt-engine/scripts/archiver.js dist && npm run favicon-dev && concurrently --kill-others "npm run dirt-engine-archiver-dev-shared" "npm run dirt-engine-archiver-dev-ui" "npm run dirt-engine-archiver-dev-video" "npm run html-dev" "npm run sass-dev" "npm run serve-dev" "npm run tsc-dev" "npm run webpack-dev" -n ARCS,ARCU,ARCV,HTML,SCSS,HTTP,TS,WEBP --pad-prefix
scripts.prod: rimraf dist && npm run lint && npm run sass && npm run tsc && node src/dirt-engine/scripts/archiver.js dist && npm run html && npm run html-minify && npm run webpack && npm run favicon && rimraf dist/working
